name: freakishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very unusual or unexpected, especially in an unpleasant or strange way: He was ashamed of the freakishness of his own appearance. Earlier images in the paintings emphasized freakishness and a sense of "the other". See
freakish
More examplesFewer examplesThey felt sympathy for her physical freakishness. In the freakishness of affection, they had drunk from one cup.The audience is asked to consider the relationship between normality and freakishness.
